Summary: Biochemical reaction from pantoprazole to pantoprazole sulfone. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from 4-demethyl pantoprazole to pantoprazole sulfate.
Biochemical reaction from pantoprazole to pantoprazole sulfide. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from pantoprazole to 4-demethyl pantoprazole. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C19.
Transport from pantoprazole to pantoprazole. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCG2 or ABCB1.
